roleset.name: tempt, entice

example.name: induced action
example.text: Sterling's firm tone, combined with a steady opening on Wall Street, also tempted some investors to come back to the market, dealers said.
example.arg: Sterling's firm tone, combined with a steady opening on Wall Street,
to come back to the market

example.name: passivized with instrument
example.text: [John]-1 was sorely tempted *trace*-1 by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie.
example.arg: by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie

roleset.note: This effectively conflates the emotion and induced-action senses.Perhaps someday we'll split those apart. No comparison. VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, force-59.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'tempt' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
